text: Douglas J. La Follette (born June 6, 1940) is an American academic, environmental scientist, and politician. He was the 30th Secretary of State of Wisconsin from 1983 to 2023. He is a member of the Democratic Party. He was re-elected in 2022 to a 12th term in office, but retired shortly after the start of the new term. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:American chemists Category:American environmentalists Category:Academics from Wisconsin Category:Politicians from Wisconsin Category:Scientists from Wisconsin Category:Businesspeople from Wisconsin Category:Politicians from Des Moines, Iowa Category:Scientists from Iowa Category:Businesspeople from Des Moines, Iowa Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Doug La Follette
